data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Digest::SHA::Perl is identical to Digest::SHA with respect to
    functionality and programmer interface. However, it's implemented in
    Perl, whereas the latter is written in C. This gives Perl users the
    ability to compute SHA message digests even if they lack a C
    compiler. CPAN currently lacks a Perl-only implementation of SHA, so
    I believe the addition of such a module would be useful.

    A further rationale and discussion of the module can be found under
    the following thread on comp.lang.perl.modules:

    RFC: Digest::SHA::Perl
